item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 11 May 2021
item.description:
1. Software engineer position at LexiFi (Paris)
  2. Open source editor for iOS, iPadOS and macOS
  3. Backend developer position at Issuu (Copenhagen)
  4. 25 years of OCaml
  5. OCaml compiler development newsletter, issue 1: before May 2021
  6. After so many years, I discover 'Str.bounded_full_split regexp str n'
  7. Parser for the Scala programming language?
